crimm.StructEntities.Chain

Functions

convert_chain(chain)

Convert a Biopython Chain class to general Chain

Classes

BaseChain(chain_id)

Base class derived from and Biopython chain object and compatible with Biopython's functions

Chain(chain_id)

General/Unspecified Chain object based on Biopython Chain

CoSolvent(chain_id)

Glycosylation(chain_id)

Heterogens(chain_id)

A chain of heterogens.

Ion(chain_id)

Ligand(chain_id)

A chain of ligands.

Macrolide(chain_id)

MaskedSeq(missing_res_ids, can_seq, seq_start)

A sequence masked with '-' for any missing residues for visualization purposes.

NucleosidePhosphate(chain_id)

Oligosaccharide(chain_id)

PolymerChain(chain_id, entity_id, ...[, ...])

A derived Chain class for holding only polypeptide or nucleotide residues with sequence id reset to be continuous and start from 1 (MMCIF standard).
